title: Feign Death

Level 3 Necromancy Spell

Put an ally in a protective coma. They become Resistant to all damage types except for Psychic. Disease and poison have no effect.

Feign Death is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Feign Death is a Lvl 3 Spell from the Necromancy school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Feign Death Information

Description: Put an ally in a protective coma. They become Resistant to all damage types except for Psychic. Disease and poison have no effect. Level: Lvl 3 spell School: Necromancy School Casting Time: Action Range: Melee Requires Concentration: No Saving Throw: N/A

Feign Death Tips & Notes

Stealing: Can be used on friendly Traders (give items or gold worth large sums). Failing pickpocket will only end attempt for that round, but not awaken the NPC. When the spell expires, the trader will awaken unaware of having been robbed. (May not work in Honor Mode) Crime: If your player is caught in a crime and a guard approaches, quickly casting Feign Death on the culprit will prevent interrogation and the guard will usually lose interest before the spell expires.
